reviewDetails.comment: Best skin doctor in NYC

She takes the time to discuss everything you want to discuss. She is very pleasant to work with and very knowledgeable. Her office staff is also very pleasant and efficient. The overall experience could not be better.
She was good and caring and took time to answer all questions
Yes - was fantastic. Really enjoyed her way of interacting as well as her advice
Dr. Liebman is extremely thorough and had very helpful recommendations. I highly recommend her as a dermatologist.
She was willing to educate me on preventive care and answer my question even after my visit.

The virtual visit with Dr. Liebman was absolutely excellent. She went above an beyond when it came to my prescribed medications and locating a pharmacy that actually had it in stock. I truly appreciate hers and her teams’ excellent work ethics and dedication towards their patients.

reviewDetails.comment: This was my first visit with Dr. Simonson after my long time OBGYN retired. I was beyond impressed. She's incredibly knowledgable and practical, with a great bedside manner. She's incredibly thorough, listened to all my concerns, and did further testing to cover all the bases. Excellent staff, and well-run office, as well.
Information in my chart was consistently wrong. Doctor disregarded my pain and when I asked her to stop during a painful procedure, she continued. Highly regret seeing this doctor.
Dr. Simonson is very courteous and gentle.  She ensures that she explains to the patient what she's about to perform.  She is a great doctor.
Always makes me feel comfortable during visits. Very professional and honest.

Dr Simonson led my pregnancy and delivered my daughter. I couldn’t have wished for a better doctor - very experienced and caring, she took time to explain things, supported her suggestions with data, but never pushed an opinion on me. The delivery experience with her was great as well - it was my first baby, so she gave me clear guidance on what to do while being very supportive.

For my next pregnancy I will be coming back to her!
